name: Eldritch Carnage
description:
This game was made in about 9 days for the GDN Game Jam, with the theme of "Rebirth".

Eldritch Carnage is a top-down arcadey shooter, where you can reincarnate in your enemies bodies every time you die. 

You play as an eldritch abomination named Osiris, who has a supernatural ability to reincarnate into any living creature on death.

Player reincarnating into an enemy

Once you do die, you'll have to act fast and click on a new human to reincarnate as, else the game ends.

Credits:

All in-game assets, aside from a few sound effects and fonts were created from scratch by myself.

Font: "Kenny Pixel" https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-font
